metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento combinado de sildenafil e iloprost inhalado en paciente pediátrica con hipertensión arterial pulmonar grave.
[Combined treatment of sildenafil and inhaled iloprost in pediatric patients with severe pulmonary arterial hypertension].
